mapper.insert: insert into song (song_id, singer_id, song_desc, song_style, song_langue, song_path, song_pic_path) values (#{songId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{singerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{songDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songLangue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update song set singer_id = #{singerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, song_desc = #{songDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, song_style = #{songStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, song_langue = #{songLangue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, song_path = #{songPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, song_pic_path = #{songPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where song_id = #{songId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select song_id, singer_id, song_desc, song_style, song_langue, song_path, song_pic_path from song
